alert.note: Alert for Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hinds County through 630 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Edwards, or 14 miles southwest of Clinton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Utica around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Learned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and west central Mississippi.
